original_text: He shall break the obelisks of Heliopolis, which is in the land of Egypt, and the temples of the gods of Egypt he shall burn with fire.’”
korean_text: 그가 또 애굽 땅 벧세메스의 석상들을 깨뜨리고 애굽 신들의 신당들을 불사르리라 하셨다 할지니라 하니라

sentences.original_text: He shall break the obelisks of Heliopolis
which is in the land of Egypt
and the temples of the gods of Egypt
